mapper.sql: id, notice_name, notice_role, notice_title,notice_content, enable, operator_id, operate_time, creator_id, create_time, modifier_id, modify_time, ts, dr
mapper.insert: insert into pro_elite_notice (id, notice_name, notice_role, notice_content,notice_title, enable, operator_id, operate_time, creator_id, create_time, modifier_id, modify_time, ts, dr) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{noticeName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{noticeTitle,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{noticeRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noticeContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{operatorId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifierId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ts,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dr,jdbcType=CHAR})

notice_name,

notice_content,

mapper.update:
update pro_elite_notice
notice_name = #{noticeName,jdbcType=CHAR},
notice_title = #{noticeTitle,jdbcType=CHAR},
notice_role = #{noticeRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notice_content = #{noticeContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=CHAR},
operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=CHAR},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modifier_id = #{modifierId,jdbcType=CHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ts = #{ts,jdbcType=BIGINT},
dr = #{dr,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update pro_elite_notice set notice_name = #{noticeName,jdbcType=CHAR}, notice_title = #{noticeTitle,jdbcType=CHAR}, notice_role = #{noticeRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notice_content = #{noticeContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=CHAR}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=CHAR}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifier_id = #{modifierId,jdbcType=CHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ts = #{ts,jdbcType=BIGINT}, dr = #{dr,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update.foreach:
update pro_elite_notice
notice_name = #{item.noticeName,jdbcType=CHAR},
notice_title = #{item.noticeTitle,jdbcType=CHAR},
notice_role = #{item.noticeRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notice_content = #{item.noticeContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enable = #{item.enable,jdbcType=CHAR},
operator_id = #{item.operatorId,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{item.operateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{item.creatorId,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{item.createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modifier_id = #{item.modifierId,jdbcType=CHAR},
modify_time = #{item.modifyTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ts = #{item.ts,jdbcType=BIGINT},
dr = #{item.dr,jdbcType=CHAR}
where id = #{item.id,jdbcType=CHAR}

mapper.select: select pen.id, pen.notice_name, pen.notice_role, pen.notice_title,pen.notice_content, pen.enable, pen.operator_id, pen.operate_time, pen.creator_id, pen.create_time, pen.modifier_id, pen.modify_time, pen.ts, pen.dr from pro_elite_notice pen , pro_property_values ppv where ppv.value_code=pen.notice_name AND ppv.property_type_id = 'C501BE734C000000DL3C000000000000' AND ppv.value_code = #{noticeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND pen.notice_role = #{noticeRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND pen.dr='N' AND pen.enable='Y' AND ppv.dr='N'
